subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Patriots sacked Peyton Manning three times during their regular-season game Nov. 5, but the Colts still won, 27-20, as Manning threw for 326 yards and 2 touchdowns.
snippet: The Patriots sacked Peyton Manning three times during their regular-season game Nov. 5, but the Colts still won, 27-20, as Manning threw for 326 yards and 2 touchdowns.
